word: Moses said, "When they have a matter, they come unto me; and I judge between one and another, and I do make them know the statutes of God and his laws." Exodus 18:16. This work is still to be done, and if the men who now bear responsibilities will not do it, then it must be committed to others. The Lord's work must be carried forward without guile, hypocrisy, or covetousness.
